import React from 'react'; import Top from '../Top/Top'; import Bottom from '../Bottom/Bottom'; ; ; class App extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { username: null, }; } componentDidMount() { fetch('api') .then((res) => res.json()) .then((data) => this.setState({ username: data.username })); fetch('api/text') .then((res) => res.json()) .then((data) => this.setState({ textname: data.textname })); fetch('api/writer') .then((res) => res.json()) .then((data) => this.setState({ writername: data.writername })); fetch('api/datetime') .then((res) => res.json()) .then((data) => this.setState({ datetime: data.datetime })); } render() { const { username } = this.state; const { textname } = this.state; const { writername } = this.state; const { datetime } = this.state; return ( <>
    번호 제목 작성자 작성일 Add
    {username ? `${username}` : 'not'} {textname ? `${textname}` : 'not'} {writername ? `${writername}` : 'not'} {datetime ? `${datetime}` : 'not'} Edit Delete More
{' '} ); } } export default App;
